Plot: A burgeoning stand-up comedian struggles with the stress of a stalled career, a stale relationship, and the wild spurts of severe sleepwalking he is desperate to ignore.
Title: Sleepwalk with Me
Writer: Mike Birbiglia (screenplay), Ira Glass (screenplay), Joe Birbiglia (screenplay), Seth Barrish (screenplay), Mike Birbiglia (based on the play "Sleepwalk With Me" by)
Actors: Mike Birbiglia, Lauren Ambrose, James Rebhorn, Carol Kane
tomatoConsensus: Laugh-out-loud funny and endearingly messy, Sleepwalk with Me overcomes its tonal inconsistencies to deliver a sweetly melancholic, amiably reassuring indie crowd-pleaser.
